topic: Case Studies of Toplighting in Buildings
body:
Hi everyone,




Would you please help me to provide a list of "well-toplit buildings"? I'm
looking for Roof Daylighting Systems and I want to model them with computer.
Do you have any case studies in mind?




Thank you


Ladan
